content.question: A researcher claims that the predator avoidance behavior of juvenile salmon observed in the study has evolved because of natural selection. Which of the following data could best be used to support the claim?

choices.label: The salmon that avoid predators have longer life spans as compared with salmon that do not avoid predators.
The salmon that avoid predators can grow to a larger size as compared with salmon that do not avoid predators.
The salmon that avoid predators are able to access more resources as compared with salmon that do not avoid predators.
The salmon that avoid predators have a greater number of viable offspring as compared with salmon that do not avoid predators.

content.answer: The salmon that avoid predators have a greater number of viable offspring as compared with salmon that do not avoid predators.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
